textBeforeTable: Police Public Safety Personnel Retirement System Board, Tucson (TPPSPRSB) Boards & Commissions Search Search form Jump to navigation
textAfterTable: TPPSPRSB Minutes 02-04-14 TPPSPRSB Minutes 01-07-14 2) Description To decide all questions of eligibility and service credits, and determine the amount, manner and time of payment of any benefits under the system. exempt from the 8 year term limit. (this is a state board) 3) Maximum Number of Members 6 4) Meeting Location Fire Central, 300 S. Fire Central Place 5) Meeting Time Meets on the 1st Tuesday of each month; at 9:00 a.m. 6) Information Sheet Datapage 7) Members Member Role Appointor Classification Mr. Michael Dietsch Member Elected Mr. Curry Hale Member Mayor Mr. Terrence O'Hara Member Elected Mr. Max Parks Member Civil Service Commission Civil Service Commission Chairperson Mr. Jonathan Rothschild Chairperson Mayor Mayor/Designee For further information please contact the City Clerk's Office at (520) 791-4213. Datapages for the boards are provided in Adobe PDF format. You'll need the free Acrobat Reader to view the documents. Government Mayor & Council City Manager's Office
